pr_title: fix: unit test coverage for KeyVault Secrets

timeline.message: fix: unit test coverage for KeyVault Secrets

timeline.body:
The difference between this method and the one above is that this one accepts a polling duration, while both use a `PollerFlux` under the hood.
```suggestion
    public void recoverDeletedSecretNotFoundWithPollingDuration(HttpClient httpClient, SecretServiceVersion serviceVersion) {
```
